trans-unit.target: TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_SEQ_00<tab>Ranulf wants to help the Barber.
TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_TODO_00<tab>Scatter the fine powder at the designated location and obtain a bottle of antlion secretion from the antlion ambusher.
TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the bottle of antlion secretion to Ranulf.
TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_RANULF_000_000<tab>Think you'd be able to lend me a hand?

TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_RANULF_000_001<tab>I've been trying to gather supplies for the Barber. While I've managed to get some blankets and bandages, I've not been able to procure any disinfectant. That's what I need your help for─I want you to bring me a bottle of antlion secretion.
TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_RANULF_000_002<tab>I'll collect the other ingredients I need. I just need you to slay an antlion.
TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_RANULF_000_003<tab>Only the antlions that dwell beneath the earth secrete the kind of liquid I need. Use this to draw them to the surface.
TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_RANULF_000_004<tab>It's a powder made of crushed ants, their favorite food. Scatter it anywhere they're known to dwell and you'll be faced with one in no time at all.
TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_RANULF_000_005<tab>Head to Virdjala in the Fringes. You'll not struggle to find an antlion there.
TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_RANULF_000_006<tab>Scatter that powder in Virdjala and slay any antlions that come to the surface. Don't forget to collect the liquid they secrete!
TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_RANULF_000_021<tab>Exactly what I needed. I'll be able to make enough disinfectant to last a while with this.
TEXT_STMBDZ912_02868_RANULF_000_022<tab>Even the smallest of wounds can be fatal if they become infected. We can't let the Barber run out of the stuff.
